definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="direction_foreach_horizontal"><value name="_placeholder"><block type="direction_iterator"></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="projectile_shoot_from_pos"><value name="projectile"><block type="projectiles_arrow"><field name="projectile">CUSTOM:GammaRay</field><field name="fire">FALSE</field><field name="particles">FALSE</field><field name="pickup">DISALLOWED</field><value name="damage"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="knockback"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="piercing"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="shooter"><block type="entity_none"></block></value></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="dx"><block type="direction_offset_x"><value name="direction"><block type="direction_iterator"></block></value></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="direction_offset_y"><value name="direction"><block type="direction_iterator"></block></value></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="direction_offset_z"><value name="direction"><block type="direction_iterator"></block></value></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="inaccuracy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
